row.process: :SET &IS_EXT# = STR_FIND(&INPUT_PARAM#, "EXT:") ! &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# must be declared beforehand. :IF &IS_EXT# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&INPUT_PARAM# is not valid. Maybe the value has not been passed from ARA." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER : SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 ! : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" ! : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" ! $errors = 100 ! : ELSE ! set /a errors=100 ! : ENDIF ! : ENDIF ! : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" ! errors=100 ! : ENDIF :ENDIF
